name: Trip of the Iceberg
description:
This little ice cube dreams of becoming a great iceberg in the sea.

Use the map different effects to help this little fella achieve his goal!

ps: There is plenty of bugs! Sometimes the ice growing effect doesn't work and all sorts of funky stuff.

The game is pretty barren, but I didn't have time to focus on the stage building. 

I hope to improve all these points in the future!
